title: AI Service API Design
shortDescription: Design production-ready API contracts for AI/ML inference services with proper error handling, versioning, and async patterns.
jobsToBeDone: Plan for model versioning and fallbacks

inputs.label: Inference Type
inputs.example: Synchronous with async fallback for large documents

inputs.label: Input Types
inputs.example: PDF documents (up to 100 pages), images (PNG, JPG), scanned documents

inputs.label: Output Format
inputs.example: Structured JSON with extracted fields, confidence scores, and bounding boxes

inputs.label: Latency Requirements
inputs.example: p95 < 5s for single page, async for multi-page with webhook callback

inputs.label: API Consumers
inputs.example: Internal web app, mobile SDK, enterprise customers via REST API
